Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Iindumiso (zonke) mazibe kuAllah iNkosi, uMlondolozi wamazwe
NguWe (Wedwa) esiMnqulayo, nguWe Wedwa esicela uncedo kuYe
INdlela yabo uBabalo lwaKho lwaba phezu kwabo, hayi kweyabo ingqumbo (yaKho) yaba phezu kwabo, ingabi yiyo neyabo balahlekayo. Aamîn
